import React from 'react'; import livraison from "../assets/icon/livraison.png" import panier from "../assets/icon/panier.png" import place from "../assets/icon/place.png" import confirmer from "../assets/icon/confirmer.png" import $ from 'jquery'; const Stepbarre = (props) => { return (
{ if($("#stepPanier").hasClass("stepValide")){ $(".stepActive").removeClass("stepActive") $(".stepImage").removeClass("stepValide") $("#stepPanier").addClass("stepActive") props.toPanier } } }>
{props.button}
); } export default Stepbarre;
